sentences.en: AIDS is the common issue that all humankind are facing.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病是全人类面临的共同问题.

sentences.en: All religions believe God made the world as well as the humankind.
sentences.cn: 所有的宗教相信神创造了世界,包括人类.

sentences.en: Bible of Game Theory, an encyclopedia of the wisdom of humankind!
sentences.cn: 《博弈圣经》, 人类智慧大百科全书!

sentences.en: But he sensed something like it, sensed the awesome truth, and as he stood there staring at the riverbank he was seeing it for all humankind.
sentences.cn: 但他横生了一些感觉，更是对某种令人敬畏的真理有了体察，当他站在那里注视河岸时，整个人类都因此而受益。

sentences.en: Freedoms of individuals or the humankind are not an illusion.
sentences.cn: 人或人类的自由并不是空中楼阁.

sentences.en: It may have been the closest that humankind has ever come to encountering extraterrestrials.
sentences.cn: 这可能是人类最近地遇到外星球生物.

sentences.en: Let us sacrifice the seraphs for the good of humankind.
sentences.cn: 六翼天使作祭品人性之善得保全.

sentences.en: Of all living things on earth what else doesn't look like humankind?
sentences.cn: 世间万物之中,有什么东西能够完全不像人 呢 ?

sentences.en: She always used & quot ; humankind & quot ; because & quot ; mankind & quot ; seemed to slight the women.
sentences.cn: 她总是使用“ humankind ”(人类)这个词, 因为“ mankind ”(人类)好像忽视了女性的存在.

sentences.en: Technical progress frees humankind of heavy labour and inconvenience.
sentences.cn: 技术进步将人类从繁重的体力劳动和生活不便中解放出来.

sentences.en: The Bible is God's story as he interacts with humankind.
sentences.cn: 这是上帝和人类相互作用的故事.

sentences.en: The East - Sun is contributing better quality and service to humankind.
sentences.cn: 东部阳光人正以更优的产品质量、更好的售后服务造福人类.

sentences.en: The season does induce a quickening of the blood and a heightening of humankind's sensual pleasures.
sentences.cn: 这个季节的确会加速血液循环、提高人们感官的兴奋程度.

sentences.en: Those who know life's final meaning Which all humankind must learn.
sentences.cn: 净理了可悟,胜因夙所宗.

sentences.en: Usually disasters happen within the interaction between humankind and natural system.
sentences.cn: 灾害往往伴随在人类与自然系统的交互作用中.

sentences.en: We rarely think of how it all affects the environment and humankind.
sentences.cn: 我们很少考虑它对环境和人类的影响。

sentences.en: Who can predict the misery that may befall humankind?
sentences.cn: 谁又能够预测可能降临到人类头上的灾难 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 人类；人道；仁慈；人文学科
